catchPhrase.message: Get an alert as soon as your favourite films and series are available online!

installedIntroduction.message: The only application that allows you to keep track of your upcoming TV shows and movies!

installedFeatures.message: enables you to subscribe to titles directly from the pages of our site

installedInstructions.message: You can then access your subscriptions by clicking on the dedicated icon

installedDataCollection.message: To function properly, this extension collects anonymised technical and browsing data.

installedChangeOptions.message: You can change the options concerning this collection at any time

noSubscriptionYet.message: You don't have any subscriptions yet...

wouldYouLikeToSubscribe.message: Do you want to subscribe to new offers?

goToOneOfTheseSitesToSubscribe.message: To subscribe, go to the description of a film or series on our site:

notifySubscribe.message: Sign up for this title to be informed of its availability through our extension!

notifyAlreadySubscribed.message: You have already signed up for this title.

notifyAlreadySubscribedComment.message: You will be informed of new releases when available.

notifyMaxSubscriptions.message: You are now subscribed to nearly $MAX$ titles!

notifyMaxSubscriptionsComment.message: This is the maximum: you must now sort them by clicking on the icon at the top right of your browser

notifyNewSubscription.message: You have now signed up for this title.

notifyUnavailableService.message: Hm... The service seems to be unavailable at the moment.

notifyUnavailableServiceComment.message: Please try again later... We are sorry for the inconvenience.

offersBeingImported.message: Offers for this title are being imported...

noAvailableOfferForThisTitle.message: There are no offers available for this title yet...

optionsAllowErrorsDataCollection.message: Allow Pop2Watch to collect anonymised data for error reporting purposes:

optionsAllowUsageDataCollection.message: Allow Pop2Watch to collect data about the use of its functions.

optionsAllowUsageDataCollectionReason.message: These data are sent for statistical analysis to help us improve the extension:

optionsAllowLinksDataCollection.message: Allow Pop2Watch to collect anonymised data about the cultural sites visited. These data are collected for statistical purposes, and help us to understand trends in the consumption of cultural goods. The link settings are systematically removed to prevent any personal information from being sent.

optionsAllowCollectionDetail.message: technical data including: device, browser, operating system
